message: Hey Bob, I'm selling this great product that you've shown interest in. I'm willing to let it go for $130. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay up to $100 for it.
Hey Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $100 is a little low for me. I'm willing to come down to $120, which is still a great deal considering the value of this product. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $110.
